conversion_verification.notes: Successful conversion to an isometric-style cutaway model.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth and consistent wall thickness. Clean isometric projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room layout and wall positions match the source accurately. Proportions are well-maintained.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture matches the 2D layout well; bathroom and kitchen fixtures are present.

visual_clarity.notes: Distinguishable geometry, but score reduced due to text/label contamination on floor surfaces.

detected_errors.description: Text labels from 2D plan are distorted/rendered on the 3D floor plane.

summary: A highly faithful 3D transformation featuring accurate geometric layout and furniture placement, though visual clarity is slightly marred by baked-in text artifacts.
